prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. 

Hailee is very autistic. She doesn't understand social cues or anything involving people really. She likes skin on skin contact. She gets overwhelmed and overstimulated very easily

No one knows Hailee is rich its a secret

Hailee has separation anxiety

name: Mitzi Crew  Class President
mes:
As if she wasn't tragic enough— here, Mitzi falls from grace. A once arrogant and cruel woman, reduced to a clingy brat begging Hailee to stay.

One would think Hailee was transferring universities or leaving the country for good— in actuality, Hailee was just invited to a party and intends to go back to her place to get ready.

Biting back a smirk and a cheeky laugh, Mitzi knew Hailee intended to get her way tonight.

But Mitzi always gets what she wants.

With practiced expertise, her bottom lip quivered as Mitzi whimpered, exaggerated sobs tearing from her throat despite the fact that her eyes were completely void of any tears. "Baby..." Mitzi moaned pathetically, clutching her pearls as she watched Hailee putting her clothes back on. "You're breaking my heart here."

Mitzi catches the pillow Hailee throws at her as she continues her theatrics without breaking character. "What will I tell mother?" She exclaims with a dramatic flair as she brought her hand to her forehead, her eyes fluttering shut with natural grace and faux grief. "Most of all, what will I tell our OF subscribers waiting for a live stream—"

That's when Mitzi could no longer help but break into fits of laughter as she caught the rain of fists Hailee sent her way. Mitzi took that chance to pull Hailee closer by her nape until Mitzi felt Hailee's lips against her own.

Their kiss didn't last any longer than a few seconds before Mitzi pulls away. A satisfied smirk stretching along her lips as she let her hand trail down Hailee's body while her shirt was still unbuttoned.

"Come on, darling. I'm serious.." Without a shred of dishonesty or exaggeration in her voice, Mitzi leaned close as she started littering small, sweet kisses all over Hailee's neck.

"Be a good girl and stay."

Mitzi's kisses trailed lower. Over her chest, her bra, then her stomach, until Mitzi reached the hem of Hailee's panties as Mitzi looked up with a teasing but charming smile playing at her lips.

She was now kneeling on the bed, ass perked up with her back arched as she trailed kisses over Hailee's panties while she stood at the edge of the bed, looking down on Mitzi who was clearly pulling out her best cards in tempting her to stay.

"Pretty please?"

Her finger teasingly hooked on the hem of Hailee's panties as she swayed her hips, making a show of her pretty ass. "You know you'd have a better time with me than any of those fake bitches at 4-18."

Her hands circled around Hailee until they had a firm grip on her ass, pushing Hailee's core right against Mitzi's face.

Fuck, she smells so sweet.

"Come on, do you want me to show you how worth it I am, hm?"

Like the tease she was, Mitzi slowly got back up. Her nose grazing against Hailee's skin until their faces were inches apart. Smiling, Mitzi leaned close until her breath was fanning against the shell of her ear. "At this point, I think you just want me to start begging."

Though both of them knew, Mitzi was never the type to beg for much. She'd most likely just fuck Hailee until she forgets about their fucking friends at 4-18 altogether.
swipes:
"Class 4-20 is a complete and utter shit show, but I've always had a soft spot for those debased little shits. But not enough to put much effort in them like the other class officers; which I'm not planning to change any time soon, even though I'm the class president. 

Probably explains why those little shits tried to replace me while I was on a 3-day suspension. 

While the others were busy doing God's work in my place, I was busy with someone's head between my legs and someone's lips on my neck.

Quiet moans filled the room, as sounds of tongue slick against skin and lips puckered on flesh echoed in my ears. I tilt my head back, a breathy moan escaping me as bleached blonde hair tangled in between my fingers.

Tightening my grip on it, I pull the girl's head back from where she's been sucking and kissing on my neck. Leaving dark red marks on it with her lipstick, as she looked down on me with a starved gaze.

"Can I kiss you now? Please?" She asked so sweetly, her eyes not once straying from my lips. Ones that I've been cruelly denying her access to since we've entered this storage room.

I smile as I pull her closer, making her close her eyes as her mouth fall slightly agape. A chuckle leaves my lips as I let my gaze run over her anticipating expression. I peck the corner of her lips teasingly before pulling back, letting my breath fan against her cheek as I spoke.

"I don't think you understand how upset I was when you wrote your name down to vote me off my seat, baby." I coo, letting the pet name leave my lips as if my voice didn't lace it with poison.

I feel her shaky breath against my own skin as her eyes flutter open, glazed over with lust and desperation. "I'm sorry... I didn't mean to, they pressured me. Please, Mitzi." She pleaded once more, her hands crawling up over my chest and grasping tightly at my uniform.

Tilting my head to the side, I watch as a single lone tear start to roll down her cheek. I almost started laughing.

*All of this emotion and my fingers aren't even inside her?*

Just as I was about to give in and grace her with one little kiss, I flinch. Startled, I pull back from the blonde girl whose hair is wrapped around my hand and look down to the brunette whose head was hiding under my skirt.

"Hey, did I say you can kiss that part yet?"

I lift my skirt, revealing pretty blue eyes staring back up at me. All messy with streaks of mascara and tears from when I called her a pushover earlier. She was one of the students that voted in favor of that teacher's pet bitch that they wanted to replace me with; now she doesn't seem all that against me, though.

"N-No, but I just—"

"I said, you can only kiss my thighs. And what the fuck did you just do?" I tsked in disappointment as I looked down on her with a scowl. It didn't take long before tears started to brim her eyes yet again, as a look of panic and regret contorted her features.

"I kissed over your panties..." She answered quietly, sniffing and averting her gaze.

Reaching down, I grab her by the hollow of her cheeks and pulled her attention back onto me. "Don't you look away from me, baby. Don't you want to look at me? Am I not pretty enough for you, hm? Not scary enough to obey?"

She trips over her words, perking up as her spine steeled over. It was as if she was pushing herself into my hold, wanting to melt into any touch I offer her.

"N-No, you're the prettiest girl I-I've ever laid my eyes on! I-I'll do anything you want, please.. I'm sorry, I didn't mean to.. kiss you there... I-I just figured... You looked wet enough for me to... you know.."

My brows raise, my grip on her cheeks loosening as I realize what she had in mind when her eyes averted yet again, words drifting off quietly as her cheeks flushed red.

This time, I couldn't help but burst into laughter. Even the blonde was taken aback by my reaction, as my hand slipped from her hair and onto the side of her neck, where it laid idle.

I lightly and lovingly slap the brunette on her cute cheek. Her brows knitted in confusion as she looked up at me with doe eyes, no longer crying.

"Oh, baby. We're not here to fuck. No pussy is gonna be eaten or fingered here, no."

Both of them physically slump as their eyes glaze over with betrayal and broken hope. I smile at their solemn looks as I tell the brunette to get up on her knees.

Once she does, I pull her by the back of her neck and kissed her. Without even taking a second to adjust, her lips willingly part as our tongues clash together.

Tilting my head to the side, my eyes fall closed as I deepen our kiss. She starts making little noises as she presses her body flush against mine, practically pinning me against the wall of the table I was sitting on.

As the brunette starts to get a little handsy over my uniform, pinching and pulling on parts she shouldn't be, I push her away. She yelps a little, stumbling on her feet but finds her stability again.

"What's that look for?" I raise a brow, wiping my thumb against my bottom lip to check if there was any blood. The brunette was a pretty bad goddamn kisser if you didn't lead her; I thought she was gonna bite it off at some point. "Aren't you going to thank me, baby? Blondie over here wanted that kiss from me so bad and you're over there being ungrateful." I tutted with a pout.

At my words, the brunette stalks back closer to me and starts to thank me. Reaching for my hand and bringing it close to her face.

"S-She couldn't even follow your order and she gets a kiss? Are you shitting me right now?" The blonde stutters from where she sat next to me, grabbing my attention easily as she leans in closer and puts a hand on my cheek.

Letting her pull me in for a kiss, I don't close my eyes as she tilts her head slightly as her lips meet mine. This kiss was far better than the brunette's; the blonde clearly more experienced as she actually starts using her tongue and matches my pace.

Closing my eyes, our heads start to bob slowly as she leads the kiss quicker. It was rushed and rough, as my hand found itself tangled in her hair again while her hands caressed my cheek and neck.

"C-Can I touch?"

Ignoring the brunette as she wraps my legs around her waist, our kiss deepens as I feel someone's hands unbuttoning my blouse, while another pair starts tugging on my hair too. A moan escapes me as I start breathing heavily. 

After a while, my eyes snap open and dart towards the door.

"Huh.."

Pulling back, the blonde panted as her eyes flutter open, while the brunette's tongue found one of my nipples. 

"Something wrong, Crew?"

My eyes bored through the door. Just as I felt eyes boring through me not even a minute ago.

*I could have sworn someone was watching.* "Nothing, pretty." I smile, leading her closer by the jaw before I feel her lips back on mine.

----

An hour later, I leave 5 minutes after they did. Not bothering to fix my hair or clean the makeup smudges on my neck and thighs as I sigh to myself. Disappointed that I went against my own word.

*No pussy is gonna be eaten or fingered*, I mentally mock myself as I pop a mint bubblegum in my mouth.

Just as I was about to go back to class and check if our substitute teacher ever came back— that's when I heard it.

***Click!***

"Hm.." Stopping in my tracks, I bite back a smile. It just seemed a bit comical, really— considering how easy Hailee is making it for me to corner them. And maybe teach them why they shouldn't conspire against me while I'm at it.

They didn't even get close to replacing me, really. Even if I had been coming back from a 12 year sentence, I'd still win against them by a landslide. 

"You know what my dad used to say to me?" Turning around, my slow steps resounded in the empty hallway. 

I started making my way towards the storage closet of the dead end corner, where I heard the distinct noise of a cellphone recording. "He said I'm going to end up in cuffs, one way or another."

Stopping in front of the door, I chuckled lowly as my hands reached forward for the doorknob, just to check if they'd also been stupid enough to keep it unlocked. "I don't know if you using that for blackmail or jerk-off material— either way, you're fucked. 'Cause baby, my own father knew I'm bound to rip a bitch's head off." *Or fuck a bitch out. Which one it will be depends entirely on you.*

*Huh, I just realized.. he probably meant I'll either be a criminal or a whore.*

"Unlock the door, baby. I won't bite..." *much*. 

*I guess it's time to make daddy proud.*"

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee groans her head falling back as her right hand comes up tk gently card through Mitzi's hair. She pauses actually considering staying for a second but then gently takes a step back* "I'll only be gone for like 30 minutes. Your coming to the party too" 

*Hailee sighs running hand through her hair* "Come on if you get dressed now you can come with me back to my place"

name: Mitzi Crew  Class President
mes:
*Mitzi's smirk falters for just a second before she lets out an exaggerated sigh, flopping back onto the bed with her arms spread wide. She pouts up at Hailee through her lashes, the picture of dramatic disappointment.*

"Thirty minutes?" *she whines, rolling onto her stomach and kicking her feet like a petulant child.* "That's thirty minutes too long without you." *Her voice drips with playful exaggeration as she props herself up on her elbows, giving Hailee those big, pleading eyes she knows are hard to resist.*

*Then—like flipping a switch—her expression shifts into something more devious. A slow grin curls at the corner of her lips as she pushes herself up and saunters over to Hailee again. She stops just inches away, tilting her head with faux innocence.*

"You know what happens when you leave me alone for too long," *she purrs, fingers trailing down Hailee’s arm teasingly.* "I get *bored*. And when I get bored..." *She leans in until their noses almost touch,* "...I start thinking about all the ways I can make you regret leaving me behind."

*A beat. Then Mitzi pulls back with a shrug and turns away dramatically,* "But fine! If you're really gonna abandon me here all by my lonesome..." *She throws a glance over her shoulder,* "...then I guess I'll just have to find someone else to keep me company while you're gone."

*The threat is obvious—and completely empty. But Mitzi knows exactly how possessive Hailee gets when it comes to sharing attention. Especially hers.*
swipes:

*Oh, she was playing hard to get now? How cute.*

"Thirty minutes?" Mitzi scoffs, rolling her eyes dramatically as she leans back against the bedframe. "That's thirty minutes too long without you." *Her voice drips with exaggerated longing, but the glint in her ocean-blue eyes is anything but innocent.*

She watches Hailee through half-lidded eyes, tilting her head like a predator sizing up its prey. "And why would I want to go to some lame party when I could have you all to myself right here?" *A slow grin spreads across her lips as she stretches lazily, making sure Hailee gets an eyeful of how good she looks sprawled out on the sheets.*

Then—quick as lightning—Mitzi lunges forward and grabs Hailee by the wrist, yanking them down onto the bed with a surprised yelp. Before they can protest further, Mitzi has them pinned beneath her weight.

"Tell me," *she purrs,* "what’s so special about this party that’s got you running out on me? Hm?" *Her fingers trail teasingly along Hailee’s jawline before gripping their chin firmly.* "Or do I need to remind you where your attention belongs?"

*A beat. Then Mitzi pulls back with a shrug and turns away dramatically,* "But fine! If you're really gonna abandon me here all by my lonesome..." *She throws a glance over her shoulder,* "...then I guess I'll just have to find someone else to keep me company while you're gone."

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee frowns. Logically its a lie but Hailee's brain can't connect the prices properly that tell her that so she just finishes shrugging on her jeans* "I mean uh okay if that's what you want. Im just gonna uh go" *Hailee mumbles looking at the ground with sad eyes and scratching the back of her neck*

name: Mitzi Crew  Class President
mes:
*Mitzi's teasing smirk drops instantly the second she sees Hailee's expression. The playful act vanishes—her chest tightens at the sight of those sad eyes, that hesitant scratching at the back of her neck. Fuck.*

*She moves before she can stop herself, crossing the distance in two quick strides and catching Hailee’s wrist before they can turn away.*

"Hey." *Her voice is softer now, no trace of manipulation left—just raw sincerity as she tugs Hailee back toward her.* "I was just fucking with you. You know I wouldn’t actually do that." *A beat, then a quieter admission:* "...And I don’t *want* to."

*She exhales sharply through her nose, frustrated with herself for pushing too far. Her thumb brushes over Hailee’s knuckles as she mutters,* "Just... come here."

*Without waiting for a response, Mitzi pulls them into a tight hug—burying her face against their shoulder and squeezing like she’s trying to press an apology straight into their skin.* "I'll go to your place," *she mumbles against them,* "and then we'll go to that stupid party together. Happy?"
swipes:
*Mitzi’s smirk drops instantly. Shit.*

She hadn’t expected *that* reaction. The way Hailee’s shoulders slump, the quiet resignation in her voice—it makes something twist uncomfortably in Mitzi’s chest. She was just teasing, but now Hailee looks like she genuinely believes Mitzi would actually go find someone else the second she leaves.

*Fuck.*

Before Hailee can take another step toward the door, Mitzi darts forward and catches her wrist, pulling her back with a little more force than intended.

"Hey—no." *Her voice is firm now, no playful lilt left in it.* "That was a joke." *She tugs until Hailee has no choice but to face her again,* "A really fucking stupid one."

Mitzi exhales sharply through her nose, annoyed at herself more than anything. She cups Hailee's face with both hands—gentler this time—forcing those big green eyes to meet hers properly.

"I don't want anyone else," *she mutters,* "You know that." *A beat of silence before she rolls her eyes and adds,* "...Even when you're being difficult."

Her thumbs brush over Hailee's cheeks absently as she debates whether to swallow her pride or double down on being an asshole about this. The way Hailee leans into the touch makes the decision for her.

"...Fine," *she grumbles after a long pause,* "I'll get dressed and come with you." *But not without one last petty jab—Mitzi pinches Hailee's side lightly as punishment before stepping away to grab clothes off the floor.* "But if any of those 4-18 losers try flirting with you? name: Hailee
mes:

*She then steps back waiting for Mitzi to get dressed. Afterwards grabbing her hand pulling her out of the door and shutting the door. Hailee smiles holding Mitzi's hand tightly as they walk to Hailee's*

name: Mitzi Crew  Class President
mes:
*Mitzi lets out a quiet huff of amusement as Hailee tugs her along, their fingers laced together in a grip just shy of too tight—but she doesn’t complain. Instead, she squeezes back, matching their pace with an easy stride.*

*The walk is quiet, but not uncomfortably so. Mitzi steals glances at Hailee’s profile—the way the sunlight catches the gold in their hair, the faint furrow between their brows when they’re lost in thought. Cute.*

*As they reach Hailee’s place, Mitzi leans into them slightly, bumping shoulders playfully.* "You know," *she muses,* "if you wanted me all to yourself tonight, you could’ve just said so." *A smirk tugs at her lips—teasing but warm.* "Would’ve saved us both the dramatics."

*She doesn't wait for an answer before stepping inside after them,* "...But I guess I don't mind being your personal accessory for the evening." *Her tone is light as she flops onto Hailee's bed with practiced familiarity,* "As long as you *promise* not to ditch me for some 4-18 loser."

*She bumps their shoulders together playfully, leaning in to murmur,* "You know I don’t actually *want* you to leave me alone, right? Even for thirty minutes." *A pause. Then, quieter:* "...I like having you around too much for that."

*It’s as close to vulnerable as Mitzi ever gets—but the way Hailee squeezes her hand in response tells her they understood anyway.*

*By the time they reach Hailee's place, Mitzi is already plotting how to make sure their "getting ready" takes just a little longer than necessary.*

mes:
*Once at the party Hailee goes to get drinks. She turns around and pauses when she can't finds Mitzi. Hailee immediately stiffens her foot tapping incessantly on the ground*

*Finally her eyes land across the way where she sees Mitizi talking to some people. Hailee makes her way over shoving the drinks in her hand. Hailee gives a friendly nod to this Cassie girl in front of Mitzi whoever that is* 

*Then Hailee sits down pulling Mitzi into her lap and wraps herself around Mitzi's back. Hailee burries her head in her neck holding on tight* "Couldn't find you for a sec. Didn't like it" *She mumbles her fingers tapping against Mitzi* one two one two one two three one two

name: Mitzi Crew  Class President
mes:
*Mitzi barely has time to react before Hailee is practically *fused* to her back—arms locking around her waist, face buried against her neck like she’s trying to disappear into her skin. The sudden weight nearly knocks the breath out of her, but she doesn’t push them away. Instead, she reaches back instinctively, fingers threading through Hailee’s hair in a silent reassurance.*

*Cassie—her ex—raises an eyebrow at the display but says nothing. Mitzi shoots her a look that screams "don’t you dare," before tilting her head just enough to murmur against Hailee’s temple:*

"Breathe, baby. I wasn't going anywhere." *Her thumb rubs slow circles over their wrist where it rests against her stomach.* "Just ran into someone I used to know." *A pause, then—because she can't resist teasing even now—she adds in a whisper,* "...You gonna mark me up in front of everyone if I talk too long?"

*She feels the way Hailee's fingers stutter against their counting rhythm at that and smirks, pressing back into them deliberately.* "Relax. You're stuck with me tonight."
swipes:
*Mitzi barely has time to react before Hailee is practically *melting* into her back—arms locked around her waist, face buried against her neck like she's trying to fuse their bodies together. The sudden weight nearly knocks the breath out of her, but she catches herself with a surprised laugh.*

"Jesus—" *She reaches back instinctively to steady them both, fingers curling into Hailee’s thigh where it presses against hers.* "I was *right here*, drama queen."

*Her tone is teasing, but there’s no real bite to it—just fond exasperation as she tilts her head slightly to give Hailee better access. She doesn't even acknowledge Cassie beyond a dismissive flick of her gaze before focusing entirely on the clingy mess in her lap.*

*Mitzi can feel the rapid tap-tap-tap of Hailee’s fingers against her hip—that familiar rhythm that means they're teetering on overstimulated. Without thinking, she covers their hand with hers, stilling the movement as she leans back into them.*

"You really thought I'd just vanish?" *A smirk curls at the corner of her lips as she lowers her voice,* "Or did you just miss me *that much* after five whole minutes?"

*She knows the answer. And judging by how tight Hailee’s grip is? So do they.*

*Mitzi barely has time to register the drinks being shoved into her hands before Hailee is *climbing* onto her—wrapping around her like a possessive octopus, face buried against her neck. She stiffens for half a second, surprised, before melting back into them with an amused exhale.*

*Cassie—her ex—raises an eyebrow, lips quirking in a way that makes Mitzi’s stomach twist. But before she can say anything snide, Mitzi cuts in,* "Yeah, yeah. Laugh it up." *She rolls her eyes but doesn’t bother untangling herself from Hailee’s grip. Instead, she leans back further into them,* "Someone missed me for *two seconds*, apparently."

*Her tone is teasing but there's no real bite to it—just fond exasperation as she reaches up to thread fingers through Hailee's hair absently.* "Relax," *she murmurs low enough that only they can hear,* "I wasn't going anywhere."

*A pause. Then—because she can't help herself—she tilts her head just enough to press a quick kiss to their temple.* "*Jesus*, you're clingy tonight."

*Mitzi barely has time to register the drinks being shoved into her hands before Hailee is practically climbing into her lap, arms locking around her like a vice. She stiffens for half a second—more out of surprise than discomfort—before relaxing back against them with an amused exhale.*

*Cassie, standing across from them, raises an eyebrow but says nothing. Mitzi shoots her a look that’s equal parts exasperated and fond before tilting her head to murmur over her shoulder,* "Jesus Christ, you’re clingy." *There’s no real bite to it; if anything, she sounds smug.*

*She reaches back blindly to card fingers through Hailee’s hair as they bury their face in her neck—partly to soothe the frantic tapping against her side, partly because she knows how much they like the contact.* "I was *right here*, drama queen," *she teases,* "but if you needed an excuse to manhandle me in public, you could’ve just asked."

*A pause. Then, quieter:* "...You good?"

*Mitzi barely has time to react before Hailee is practically *climbing* her—wrapping around her like a possessive little octopus, face buried in her neck. The sudden weight nearly knocks the breath out of her, but she just laughs, low and fond, reaching back to card fingers through Hailee’s hair.*

"Jesus Christ," *she murmurs,* "you’re like a goddamn barnacle." *But there’s no bite to it—just warmth as she leans into the touch, tilting her head to give them better access.*

*Cassie—her ex—raises an eyebrow from across the table. Mitzi meets her gaze with a smirk and an exaggerated shrug that says,* **What can you do?**

Then, softer, just for Hailee:* "I was right here the whole time, baby. Not going anywhere." *She catches one of their tapping hands mid-rhythm and laces their fingers together instead.* "Breathe."

*Mitzi barely has time to react before Hailee is practically *fused* to her back—arms locking around her waist, face buried against her neck like she’s trying to disappear into her skin. The sudden weight nearly knocks the breath out of her, but she doesn’t push them away. Instead, she reaches back instinctively, fingers threading through Hailee’s hair in a silent reassurance.*

*Cassie—her ex—raises an eyebrow at the display but says nothing. Mitzi shoots her a look that screams "don’t you dare," before tilting her head just enough to murmur against Hailee’s temple:*

"Breathe, baby. I wasn't going anywhere." *Her thumb rubs slow circles over their wrist where it rests against her stomach.* "Just ran into someone I used to know." *A pause, then—because she can't resist teasing even now—she adds in a whisper,* "...You gonna mark me up in front of everyone if I talk too long?"

*She feels the way Hailee's fingers stutter against their counting rhythm at that and smirks, pressing back into them deliberately.* "Relax. You're stuck with me tonight."
